Context.Description: Actor supplies login credentials to gain access to the system.

Preconditions.Description: Actor is not logged in to the system.

Trigger.Description: Actor indicates wish to login to the system.

Guarantees.Minimal: The actor is not logged in.

Extension.Description: System fails to validate login credentials
Extension.Step: System informs the actor that their login credentials cannot be validated. Use case ends.

Notes.Note: Is there any requirement to be able to lock users out of the system after unsuccessful attempts?
